A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was a die-hard Star Wars fan before watching this movie (prequels and all). Also\, I loved all of the characters introduced in The Force Awakens. In my opinion\, TFA was thrown out the window completely and the audience was left with this messy\, childish\, somewhat boring\, and overhyped follow-up. It honestly felt like a slap in the face and I am now very critical of Star Wars. I still plan on watching future movies\, but if the next few follow the same path as The Last Jedi\, then I’ll be very disappointed.
